attributes.action: admit he's made a fair few mistakes during his tenure as both Chancellor and PM.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Let's face it, GB's not done as brilliantly as he imagined he would. So why not force him to make a new start in this new year by admitting to all those awful, often cringe-worthy mistakes he made that he's certain aren't really his fault.

Otherwise he might blame you, me and the rest of the British public.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
